## PropertyTrack.interpolatorAlpha property

The alpha-channel interpolator for RGBA properties.

- Only used when the property type is `rgba`<!-- -->. - Setting a non-null interpolator ensures alpha state storage is allocated.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get interpolatorAlpha(): Interpolator;

set interpolatorAlpha(interpolator: Interpolator);
```
